name: Coal mine site construction; Concrete structures and asphalt paving; Underground mine
description: This dataset is part of the  National Energy Technology Laboratory (NETL) Unit Process Library.  The NETL Unit Process Library is located on the NETL website (netl.doe.gov) under Research / Energy Analysis / Energy Trends and Issues / Life Cycle Analysis / Unit Process Library.  As of 6/30/2014, the URL for the NETL Unit Process Library is:  http://www.netl.doe.gov/research/energy-analysis/life-cycle-analysis/unit-process-library.
